item.title: Gallinula
item.description: ðŸ¦†Gallinula is a Campus-Services-All-in-One Platform. The name comes from Gallinula Chloropus, which is a specie of duck that is frequently seen on campus. It is also widely (but not officially) acknowledged as the mascot of Duke Kunshan University. The following services are offered by Gallinula and currently bringing conveniences to hundreds of our DKU members including students and faculties! When’s the next shuttle? A Siri shortcut that enables you to check the next shuttle time within seconds by simply saying “Hey Siri, next shuttle”.
